code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{DndProvider}from'react-dnd';import{HTML5Backend}from'react-dnd-html5-backend';import Column from'./Column';import EventForm from'./EventForm';import'../styles/board.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const initialColumns={todos:{id:'todos',title:'To Do',items:[]},inProgress:{id:'inProgress',title:'In Progress',items:[]},completed:{id:'completed',title:'Completed',items:[]}};const Board=_ref=>{let{addEvent}=_ref;const[columns,setColumns]=useState(initialColumns);const addCard=card=>{setColumns(prevColumns=>({...prevColumns,todos:{...prevColumns.todos,items:[...prevColumns.todos.items,card]}}));addEvent(card);};const moveCard=(cardId,fromColumnId,toColumnId,hoverIndex)=>{const fromItems=[...columns[fromColumnId].items];const toItems=fromColumnId===toColumnId?fromItems:[...columns[toColumnId].items];const fromIndex=fromItems.findIndex(item=>item.id===cardId);if(fromIndex===-1){console.error("Card with id ".concat(cardId," not found in column ").concat(fromColumnId));return;}const[movedCard]=fromItems.splice(fromIndex,1);toItems.splice(hoverIndex,0,movedCard);setColumns(prevColumns=>({...prevColumns,[fromColumnId]:{...prevColumns[fromColumnId],items:fromItems},[toColumnId]:{...prevColumns[toColumnId],items:toItems}}));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DndProvider,{backend:HTML5Backend,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"board",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"event-form-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EventForm,{onAddCard:addCard})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"columns",children:Object.keys(columns).map(key=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Column,{column:columns[key],moveCard:moveCard},key))})]})});};export default Board;
